tool_description: This API provides essential functionalities for accessing, downloading, and translating subtitles of YouTube Videos
name: Youtube Subtitle Downloader and Translator
title: Youtube Subtitle Downloader and Translator

api_list.name: /languages
api_list.description: This endpoint provides a list of languages supported by the API for translating subtitles.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-subtitle-downloader-and-translator.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-subtitle-downloader-and-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-subtitle-downloader-and-translator.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-subtitle-downloader-and-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
